channel.title: Harry Potter and stuff (spoilers and such inside)
channel.description:
ohaider
StarBlaster said nothing until the 25th or 26th, now it's the 27th
Below are spoilers: [size=13pt] Burbage dies on pg. 12. Hedwig dies on pg. 56. Mad-Eye dies on pg. 78. Scrimgeour dies on pg. 159. Wormtail dies on pg. 471. Dobby dies on pg. 476. Snape dies on pg. 658. Fred Weasley dies on pg. 637 Harry gets fucked up by Voldemort on pg. 704. But... Comes back to life on pg. 724. Ron and Hermione get married and have two kids Harry and Ginny get married and have three kids. Draco has a son. Neville become a professor at Hogwart. The last line of the book is "The scar had not pained Harry for nineteen years. All was well."[/size]
Now personally, I don't read Harry Potter. I've seen like two of the movies but that's it. I do think it would keep me busy so I'll probably start reading 1-7 and watch the movies soon.
Now, my old thread was deleted about Harry liking Hermione was deleted, but I never got a reason :(
So here it is, bad grammar and all

StarBlaster said nothing until the 25th or 26th, now it’s the 27th

Below are spoilers:
[size=13pt]
Burbage dies on pg. 12.
Hedwig dies on pg. 56.
Mad-Eye dies on pg. 78.

Draco has a son.
Neville become a professor at Hogwart.
The last line of the book is “The scar had not pained Harry for nineteen years. All was well.”[/size]

Now personally, I don’t read Harry Potter. I’ve seen like two of the movies but that’s it. I do think it would keep me busy so I’ll probably start reading 1-7 and watch the movies soon.
